Literature.Title: A novel series of dipeptide derivatives containing indole-3-carboxylic acid conjugates as potential antimicrobial agents: the design, solid phase peptide synthesis, in vitro biological evaluation, and molecular docking study.
Literature.Author: Tivari SR, Kokate SV, Delgado-Alvarado E, Gayke MS, Kotmale A, Patel H, Ahmad I, Sobhia EM, Kumar SG, Lara BG, Jain VD, Jadeja Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli MTCC 443(MIC=25µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa MTCC 1688(MIC=125µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MTCC 96(MIC=150µg/ml),Streptococcus pyogenes MTCC 442(MIC=90µg/ml),Candida albicans MTCC 227(MIC=80µg/ml),Aspergillus niger MTCC 282(MIC=70µg/ml)
